name: accessible_find_in_page
description: This extention attempts to solve my issue with finding the position of matching terms in a CTRL+F search. When the user interacts with the ctrl+f popup, either by changing the term or finding the next or prior occurence, the line containing the term blinks for a short time, configurable in the options page.

scripts.build:popup: npm --prefix popup-app install --no-audit --no-fund && npm --prefix popup-app run build
scripts.build:onboarding: npm --prefix onboarding-app install --no-audit --no-fund && npm --prefix onboarding-app run build
scripts.build: npm run build:ts && npm run build:popup && npm run build:onboarding

author: Gil Teixeira
